result.title: Ad Infinitum August'14 -- HackerRank
result.content:
Hi!

Ad Infinitum is back with Infinitum August'14, a monthly contest restricted to mathematics domain, held on HackerRank.

Register at https://www.hackerrank.com/infinitum-aug14
The contest commences on 14th August 15:30 UTC. You are allowed to enter the contest anytime, for tie breaking the timer will start when you view the challenge, which allows you to start late at your convenience, but once started try to finish as fast as possible to be on top of the leaderboard :)

It's a 3 days contest with 8 problems (3 Easy, 3 Medium, 2 Hard)
Scoring Distribution: 20 20 20 40 60 80 100 120

problem statements in English, Russian and Chinese

Top 10 on leaderboard gets Cool HackerRank T shirt,
Update: Everyone with full score will get a T shirt :D

Contributers
kevinsogo
OoO000oOOOoOooOo
sevenkplus
abhra73
ma5termind
amitp08
devuy11243
morze

Detailed editorials will be available by the end of contest :) I suggest you to try all challenges and at the end of contest understand the solutions.

GL&HF
